---
title: "Set Flourish chart layout"
---

*R/chart.R*

## chart_header

## Description
 Set Flourish chart layout 


## Usage
```r
 
chart_header( 
  ., 
  align = NULL, 
  title = NULL, 
  title_font = NULL, 
  title_size = NULL, 
  title_size_custom = NULL, 
  title_weight = NULL, 
  title_color = NULL, 
  title_line_height = NULL, 
  title_space_above = NULL, 
  title_space_above_custom = NULL, 
  subtitle = NULL, 
  subtitle_font = NULL, 
  subtitle_size = NULL, 
  subtitle_size_custom = NULL, 
  subtitle_weight = NULL, 
  subtitle_color = NULL, 
  subtitle_line_height = NULL, 
  subtitle_space_above = NULL, 
  subtitle_space_above_custom = NULL, 
  text = NULL, 
  text_font = NULL, 
  text_size = NULL, 
  text_size_custom = NULL, 
  text_weight = NULL, 
  text_color = NULL, 
  text_line_height = NULL, 
  text_space_above = NULL, 
  text_space_above_custom = NULL, 
  border = NULL, 
  border_width = NULL, 
  border_color = NULL, 
  border_style = NULL, 
  border_space = NULL, 
  logo_source = NULL, 
  logo_height = NULL, 
  logo_align = NULL, 
  logo_position_inside = NULL, 
  logo_position_outside = NULL, 
  logo_margin_top = NULL, 
  logo_margin_right = NULL, 
  logo_margin_bottom = NULL, 
  logo_margin_left = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| align | Header alignment ("left", "center", "right") |
| title | Title text |
| title_font | Title font face |
| title_size | Title size - 1.4, 1.6, 2 |
| title_size_custom | Title size custom |
| title_weight | Title weight - "bold", "normal" |
| title_color | Title color |
| title_line_height | Title line height |
| title_space_above | Title space above (0, 0.5, 1) |
| title_space_above_custom | Title space above (custom number) |
| subtitle | Subtitle text |
| subtitle_font | Subtitle font face |
| subtitle_size | Subtitle size - 1.4, 1.6, 2 |
| subtitle_size_custom | Subtitle size custom |
| subtitle_weight | Subtitle weight - "bold", "normal" |
| subtitle_color | Subtitle color |
| subtitle_line_height | Subtitle text line height |
| subtitle_space_above | Space above subtitle text (0, 0.5, 1) |
| subtitle_space_above_custom | Space above subtitle text (custom number) |
| text | Header text |
| text_font | Header text font |
| text_size | Header text size (1.2, 1.4, 1.6) |
| text_size_custom | Header text size - custom number |
| text_weight | Header text weight - "bold", "normal" |
| text_color | Header text color |
| text_line_height | Header text line height |
| text_space_above | Space above header text (0, 0.5, 1) |
| text_space_above_custom | Space above header text (custom number) |
| border | "Top", "bottom", or "none" |
| border_width | Header border width |
| border_color | Header border color |
| border_style | Header border style |
| border_space | Header border space |
| logo_source | Header logo source |
| logo_height | Header logo height |
| logo_align | Align header and logo |
| logo_position_inside | Logo margin - inside chart |
| logo_position_outside | Logo margin - outside chart |
| logo_margin_top | Login margin - top |
| logo_margin_right | Logo margin - right |
| logo_margin_bottom | Logo margin - bottom |
| logo_margin_left | Logo margin - left |
